import React, { useState } from 'react' export const EditTodoForm = ({editIssue, task}) => { /*const [value, setValue] = useState("") const handleSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() if(value){ editTodo(value, task.id) } setValue("") } return (
setValue(e.target.value)} />
)*/ const [value, setValue] = useState({ issue: "", line: "", error: "", severity: "", priority: "", status: "", component: "", assignee: "" }) const [isValid, setIsValid] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const { issue, line, component, error, priority, severity, status, assignee } = value if(issue !=="" && line !=="" && component !=="" && error !=="" && priority !=="" && severity !=="" && status !=="" && assignee !==""){ setIsValid(true) }else{ setIsValid(false) } console.log(isValid) }, [value, isValid]) const handleClick = () =>{ let message let obj = Object.entries(value) const isFilled = obj.map(x=> x[1] === "" ? message = x[0] : "" ) if(!isValid) alert(` Please fill ${message} field to submit the issue`) } const handleChange = e =>{ const { name, value } = e.target setValue((prevVal) => ({ ...prevVal, [name]: value })) console.log({[name]:value}) } const handleSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() const { issue, line, component, error, priority, severity, status, assignee } = value if(issue && line && component && error && priority && severity && status && assignee){ editIssue(issue, line, component, error, priority, severity, status, assignee) setValue({ issue: "", line: "", error: "", severity: "", priority: "", status: "", component: "", assignee: "", }) setIsValid(()=>false) }else{ handleClick(e) return } } return (


) }
